name: Acceptable Losses
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each player kills one of their gear.

name: Adaptatron
description: When I conquer, you may kill a gear. If you do, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)

name: Ahri, Alluring
description: When I hold, you score 1 point.

name: Ahri, Inquisitive
description: When I attack or defend, give an enemy unit here -2 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].

name: Ahri, Nine-Tailed Fox
description: When an enemy unit attacks a battlefield you control, give it -1 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].

name: Albus Ferros
description:
When you play me, spend any number of buffs.
For each buff spent, channel 1 rune exhausted.

name: Altar to Unity
description: When you hold here, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token in your base.

name: Anivia, Primal
description: When I attack, deal 3 to all enemy units here.

name: Arena Bar
description: [Tap]: Buff an exhausted friendly unit. (if it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [Might] buff.)

name: Aspirant's Climb
description: Increase the points needed to win the game by 1.

name: Ava Achiever
description:
𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗘𝗿𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗧𝗲𝘅𝘁 - 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗥𝗶𝗼𝘁 𝗙𝗔𝗤 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝘂𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗨𝗽𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲
When I attack, you may pay [Mind] to play a card with [Hidden]
from your hand, ignoring its cost. If it’s a unit, play it here.

description: When a unit moves from here, give it +1 [Might] this turn.

name: Back to Back
description:

name: Baited Hook

[1] [order] [tap]: Kill a friendly unit. Look at the top 5 cards of
your Main Deck. You may banish a unit from among them
that has Might up to 1 more than the killed unit and play it,
ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest.

name: Bandle Tree
description: You may hide an additional card here.

name: Bilgewater Bully

[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each opponent reveals the top card of their Main Deck.
Choose one and banish it, then play it, ignoring its cost.
Then recycle the rest.

name: Blitzcrank, Impassive
description:
[Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When you play me to a battlefield, you may move an enemy unit to here.
When I hold, return me to my owner's hand.

description: [DEATHKNELL] - Draw 1. (When I die, get the effect.)

name: Whirlwind
description: Starting with the next player, each player may return a unit to its owner's hand.

name: Whiteflame Protector
description: When you play me, give a unit +8 [Might] this turn.

name: Wielder of Water
description: While I'm attacking or defending alone, I have +2 [Might].

name: Wildclaw Shaman
description: When you play me, you may spend a buff to buff me and ready me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)

name: Windswept Hillock
description: Units here have [GANKING]. (They can move from battlefield to battlefield.)

name: Wind Wall
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Counter a spell.

name: Wizened Elder
description: While I'm buffed, I have an additional +1 [Might].

name: Wraith of Echoes
description:
𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗘𝗿𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗧𝗲𝘅𝘁 - 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗥𝗶𝗼𝘁 𝗙𝗔𝗤 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝘂𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗨𝗽𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲
The first time another friendly unit dies each turn, draw 1

name: Yasuo, Remorseful
description: When I attack, deal damage equal to my Might to an enemy unit here.

name: Yasuo, Unforgiven
description:
𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗘𝗿𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗧𝗲𝘅𝘁 - 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗥𝗶𝗼𝘁 𝗙𝗔𝗤 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝘂𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗨𝗽𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲
[2], [Tap]: Move a friendly unit to or from its base.

name: Yasuo, Windrider
description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
The third time I move in a turn, you score 1 point.

name: Zaunite Bouncer
description: When you play me, return another unit at a battlefield to its owner's hand.

name: Zaun Warrens
description: When you conquer here, discard 1, then draw 1.

name: Zenith Blade
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Stun an enemy at a battlefield. You may move a friendly unit to that enemy unit's battlefield. (A stunned unit doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)

name: Zhonya's Hourglass
description:
𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗘𝗿𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗧𝗲𝘅𝘁 - 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗥𝗶𝗼𝘁 𝗙𝗔𝗤 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝘂𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗨𝗽𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲
[Hidden] (Hide now for [A] to react with later for [0].)
If a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. Heal that unit,
exhaust it, and recall it. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

name: Annie, Dark Child
description:
𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗘𝗿𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗧𝗲𝘅𝘁 - 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗥𝗶𝗼𝘁 𝗙𝗔𝗤 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝘂𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗨𝗽𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲
At the end of your turn, ready up to 2 runes.

name: Annie, Fiery
description: Your spells and abilities deal 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage they deal is increased by 1.)

name: Annie, Stubborn
description: When you play me, return a spell from your trash to your hand.

name: Blast of Power
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Kill a unit at a battlefield.

name: Decisive Strike
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Give friendly units +2 [Might] this turn.

name: Final Spark
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Deal 8 to a unit.

name: Firestorm
description: Deal 3 to all enemy units at a battlefield.

name: Flash
description:
[REACTION] (Play at any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Move up to 2 friendly units to base.

name: Garen, Commander
description: Other friendly units have +1 [Might] here.

name: Garen, Might of Demacia
description: When you conquer, if you have 4+ units at that battlefield, draw 2.

name: Garen, Rugged
description: [Assault 2], [Shield 2] (+2 [Might] while I'm an attacker or defender.)

name: Gentlemen's Duel
description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Give a friendly unit +3 [Might] this turn. Then, choose an enemy unit. They deal damage equal to their Mights to each other.

name: Highlander
description:
𝗖𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗘𝗿𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗧𝗲𝘅𝘁 - 𝗙𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗥𝗶𝗼𝘁 𝗙𝗔𝗤 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝘂𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗨𝗽𝗱𝗮𝘁𝗲
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities
resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, heal
it, exhaust it, and recall it instead. (Send it to base. This
isn't a move.)

name: Incinerate
description:
[ACTION] (play on your turn or in showdowns.) 
Deal 2 to a unit at a battlefield.

name: Lux, Crownguard
description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [2] Use only to play spells. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

name: Lux, Illuminated
description: When you play a spell that costs [5] or more, give me +3 [Might] this turn.

name: Lux, Lady of Luminosity
description: When you play a spell that costs [5] or more, draw a 1.

name: Master Yi, Honed
description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
I enter ready.

name: Master Yi, Meditative
description: While you have 8+ runes, I have +4 [Might].

name: Master Yi, Wuju Bladesman
description: While a friendly unit defends alone, it gets +2 [Might].

name: Recruit the Vanguard
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Play four 1 [Might] Recruit unit tokens. (They can be played to your base or to battlefields you control.)

name: Tibbers
description: When you play me, deal 3 damage to all units at battlefields.

name: Vanguard Attendant
description: I enter ready.

name: Zephyr Sage
description: [SHIELD] (+1 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
